name: inFeedo
description: inFeedo is a conversational employee experience platform that uses AI and people science to engage and enable your workforce. Get a unified view of your company’s health. Find what motivates employees to stay with you and predict why they might quit.
Headline: AI-powered People Experience platform that employees love
ShortDescription: AI-powered People Experience platform that employees love

Highlights.name: Amber by inFeedo
Highlights.description: Cultivate high-performing teams with a continuous and personalized Employee Engagement Platform: Your Chief Listening Officer to empathetically listen, analyze, and act on employee concerns at scale

Highlights.name: AI-Assist: AI-mazingly simplified Employee Support Platform
Highlights.description: Resolve upto 86% of your employee queries automagically with AI and boost efficiency

enhanced_description: inFeedo is an AI-powered conversational employee experience platform designed specifically for large enterprises. It leverages Artificial Intelligence and people science to continuously engage and enable the workforce. The platform, including its 'Amber by inFeedo' component, functions as a "Chief Listening Officer," empathetically listening, analyzing, and acting on employee concerns at scale to cultivate high-performing teams. It provides a unified view of company health and utilizes predictive people analytics to identify employee motivations for staying and to predict potential attrition. Additionally, through its 'AI-Assist' feature, it streamlines employee support, automating the resolution of a significant percentage of common queries (up to 86%) to boost efficiency for HR and support teams.
key_use_cases: Gaining a unified view of company health
Predicting employee attrition and identifying retention drivers
Proactively listening to and addressing employee concerns at scale
Automating employee query resolution and support
competitive_advantages: Conversational AI approach for employee experience
Predictive People Analytics for talent retention
Functions as a 'Chief Listening Officer' for empathetic, scalable employee listening
Automates a significant portion of employee query resolution (up to 86%)
Provides a unified view of company health leveraging AI and people science
roi_benefits: Reduced employee attrition through predictive insights
Increased HR/support efficiency by automating query resolution
Better understanding of company health and employee motivations
scalability_features: Capable of listening, analyzing, and acting on employee concerns at scale
